creator: pamel_1@interia.pl
text:
My apache server can't get to port 80. Apache won't start. I can see apache 
window for a very short moment, and then it suspend. I try to reinstall 
windows. It doesn't help. Please help me.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
As REPEATEDLY stated on every screen that got you to this bug tracking
  database ... do not report configuration errors to this system.

  Consult an appropriate user support forum for your configuration issues.
